advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
description:
Google Gemini app is your personal, proactive and powerful AI assistant.

With Gemini on your iPhone or iPad, you can:

– Go Live with Gemini to brainstorm ideas, simplify complex topics and rehearse for important moments. Share your camera or screen in Gemini Live conversations to talk with Gemini about anything that you see. Just click on the Gemini Live button in your Gemini app
– Bring your ideas to life with Canvas. From prompt to prototype, create apps, games, web pages, infographics, Audio Overviews and more
– Connect with your favourite Google apps, like Search, YouTube, Google Maps, Gmail and more
– Study smarter and explore any topic with quiz and flashcard creation, interactive visuals and real-world examples
– Turn any file into a podcast that you can listen to any time, anywhere
– Create and edit stunning images from just a few words
– Plan trips better and faster
– Get summaries, deep dives and source links, all in one place
– Brainstorm new ideas or improve existing ones

Try Nano Banana Pro image generation and editing built on Gemini 3. Create mockups by blending images, designing posters with sharp text and effortlessly building diagrams. Tap 'Create image' on the home screen to use text and images to describe what you'd like to generate.

Level up your Gemini app experience by upgrading to the Google AI Plus plan – unlock new and powerful features to boost your creativity and productivity:
– Get more access to our most powerful model, like 3 Pro
– Generate and dive into detailed reports on any topic with Deep Research powered by 3 Pro
– Turn words into high-quality, eight-second video clips with video generation with Veo 3.1 Fast and more.

Gemini app, as part of Google AI Plus, is available with qualifying Google Workspace business and education plans. Learn more: https://gemini.google/subscriptions/

Get even more out of your Gemini app experience by upgrading to the Google AI Pro plan, helping you tackle complex tasks and projects. Enjoy an industry-leading 1M token context window (enabling Gemini to process up to 1,500 pages of text or 30k lines of code), and higher access to our most capable model 3 Pro, Deep Research on 3 Pro and video generation with Veo 3.1 Fast.

The Gemini app, as part of Google AI Pro, is available with qualifying Google Workspace business and education plans. Learn more: https://gemini.google/subscriptions/

Get the best of Gemini [app] by upgrading to the Google AI Ultra plan – unlock the highest level of access to the best of Google AI and exclusive features. Get the highest access to Google's most powerful model, like 3 Pro, features like video generation with Veo 3.1, Deep Research on 3 Pro and unlock Gemini 3 Deep Think. You'll also get early access to try our newest AI innovations as they become available, including Agent Mode.

Google AI Ultra for Business is available as an add-on to Google Workspace customers. Learn more: https://support.google.com/a/answer/16345165

While Gemini can help you with many tasks like checking the weather, giving directions, and finding and summarising information across the web and apps, Gemini does not yet support device actions like setting an alarm, sending a text message and others on iOS.

Review the Gemini Apps Privacy Notice:
g.co/gemini/privacynotice
